about.title: About
about.text: Hey, this is me! Someone who tries to improve in many areas and chases difficult goals, also spends most of their day listening to music and fills their free time by playing games.

contact.title: Contact

projects.title: Projects
projects.error: There was a problem pulling the project data, you can check my github profile for now.

my-world.content1:
While developing this project — the first step in my journey as a web developer — I truly learned a lot. From naming variables to understanding when and how to validate data, I gained valuable experience.

In the beginning, even the simplest things would take me hours. Especially because of my obsession with details, I rewrote my CSS codes countless times, and even when I didn’t know how to write the most basic code, I was trying to write the best one. But every obstacle helped me move one step further.

This project isn’t just a completed task for me; it’s a reference point I can look back on and say, “This is where I started.” After all, my main goal was to leave a mark and grow through the process — and I think I’ve achieved that.
